The caller must have already called @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#GoogleApiClient#connect_E@ and received @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#GoogleApiClient#ConnectionCallbacks#onConnected_E@ callback.

ClassDesc: The main entry point for interacting with a Google Cast device.
